name: Downgrade
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/downgrade-vr

Competition version note:
There is a bug that causes downgrades to not clear between games, so please restart the game if you want to play again.

Every enemy you kill in this VR shooter reduces your stats. Finish rounds quickly to get Restore Points, to remove them!

Your hitbox is on your head. Bullets will turn red if they are headed towards you.

Tested with Vive

"Impact Prelude", "Ouroboros"  
Kevin MacLeod ([incompetech.com])
